metadata.title: USN-3238-1 -- Firefox vulnerability
metadata.description: An integer overflow was discovered in Firefox. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could exploit this to cause a denial of service via application crash or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2017-5428)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3238-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  firefox-locale-nl - 52.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1 firefox-locale-nn - 52.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1 firefox-locale-nb -
